alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 11:55AM EST until December 20 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at North Creek. * WHEN...From this evening to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, water reaches moderate flood stage. State Route 28 in North River has about half a foot of water across it. Carpenter`s Field is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 10.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River North Creek Flood Stage: 10.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 9.0 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 8.6 Mon 7 pm 9.7 Tue 1 am 10.1 Tue 7 am 10.5 Tue 1 pm 10.7 Tue 7 pm 10.5 Wed 1 am 10.2 Wed 7 am 9.7 Wed 1 pm 9.3 Wed 7 pm 8.9 Thu 1 am 8.5 Thu 7 am 8.2 &&
